metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0798 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in tiffcrop intools/tiffcrop.c:3400, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service viaa crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fixis available with commit afaabc3e.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0798` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiff-tools - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiff6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
libtiffxx6 - 4.5.0-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.0-5ubuntu1').
